John Rooney

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: C. A. Woodworth
  3. Location of Family: Albion, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Albion, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 7
  7. Date of Birth: 1900
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: Two Charles Woodworths in Boone Co., NE, in 1910, and neither has a 10yo John in their household. See 1910 census, Bonanza, Boone Co., NE, 8B; 1910 census, Ashland, Boone Co., NE, 3A.
  10. Source: Albion Argus (NE), 23 March 1907.
